department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two panel huipil with slit neck opening and open on the sides; white ground cloth with supplementary patterning predominantly in red with accents in aqua, yellow, pink, purple, black; band of checkerboard motif at shoulders, with wide band of red directly below; stripes of multicolored checkerboard pattern and geometric motifs appear below; finally, a row of zoomorphic figures on white ground are placed near lower edges.
medium: Cotton, silk, wool; supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
